content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, welcome to Munich! Thank you for your interest in our apartment. Our apartment is a cozy 25 square meters, and we believe it would be a great fit for you. We would like to discuss a rental price that is fair to both parties. What is your budget for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a budget of 600 Euros per month. Please let me know if there are any additional costs I should be aware of. Otherwise, I am open to negotiating. I am a student, so I am quite flexible.

I would like to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am open to any suggestions or recommendations. I am also a responsible and dependable tenant, so I am willing to sign a long-term lease if that would be beneficial for both parties.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your response, Hassan. We appreciate your flexibility and willingness to sign a long-term lease. Based on our calculations, we believe that we can offer you the apartment for a monthly rental price of 650 Euros, which includes all utilities and maintenance costs. This is a fair price for the apartment and should be within your budget.

We are confident that you will be a responsible and dependable tenant, and we would be happy to have you sign a long-term lease. Let us know if this sounds like an acceptable offer, and we can proceed with the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month. I would like to sign a long-term lease agreement. How do we proceed with the rental process?

I am very happy with the terms we have agreed on, and I am confident that this will be a great experience for both of us. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards, Hassan Rahman.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your acceptance, Hassan! We are pleased to hear that you are happy with the terms we have agreed on. In order to proceed with the rental process, we will need you to provide us with a copy of your identification and proof of income. Once we have this information, we can draft the rental agreement and have it notarized.

We will also need you to pay a security deposit, which is typically equal to one month's rent. This deposit will be returned to you at the end of the lease, provided that you have fulfilled all your obligations under the rental agreement.

We are confident that this will be a great experience for both of us, and we look forward to welcoming you to your new home. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Best regards, Heine.
name: Heinrich Heine
